PathOfBuilding.Notes:
mathil build : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5aL6LysqRDs
build thread : https://www.pathofexile.com/forum/view-thread/2639074
Leveling can feel little slow early until you finish first Lab, then start investing into poison nodes. From that point it's a zoom zoom leveling.
Useful leveling items: -Tabula Rasa, i suggest you start with -Praxis, use it from level 22 so you don't have mana problems until you get leech! -Goldrim -Wanderlust
Claws for leveling:
From level 12-26 Wildslash and start using Venom Gyre (dual claws from now on) From level 26-34 Al Dhih (you can skip this one cause it's 10c) From level 34-60 Mortem Morsu (will carry you easy till level 60) From level 60 onward The Wasp Nest
Rest of the leveling gear should be rare with priority on life and resistances. If you can't get unique claws get ones with most attack speed and physical damage that you find along the way. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Gems for Venom Gyre/Cobra Lash
start with Viper Strike - Lesser Poison Support level 5 start using Cobra Lash - Lesser Poison support OR level 12 start using Venom Gyre - Lesser Poison support add Unbound Ailments Support and Lesser Multiple Projectiles Support at level 8. Remove Poison support. add Vicious Projectiles Support and Deadly Ailments Support at level 18 add Added Chaos Damage Support at level 31 swap Lesser Multiple Projectiles Support with Greater Multiple Projectiles Support at level 38
add Vile Toxins Support at level 38 if you want extra damage on single target ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Gems for Pestilent Strike/Viper Strike
start with Viper Strike - Lesser Poison Support add Ancestral Call at lvl 4 add Melee Physical Damage Support & Deadly Ailments Support at level 18 swap Viper Strike for Pestilent Strike at level 28 (if you want Pestilent) add Added Chaos Damage Support at level 31 swap Multistrike Support with Lesser poison support add Vile Toxins Support at level 38
use Melee Phys damage instead of Ancestral call for bosses
You will have to use freeze immunity flask until you finish Uber Lab.
When you finish A Fixture of Fate quest Act 3 Siosa buy Molten Shell gem. Start using Molten Shell when you spec into Iron Reflexes keystone and get Jade flask. Also buy Spell totem support, Wither and Multiple Totem support gems. Wither totem will give significant boost to damage VS bosses
.
